Experiment Method.Assay Method: Membrane binding assay with cytosolic factors

Material used.Description: Co-incubation with brain cytosol to assess alpha-synuclein membrane binding.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P variant showed impaired membrane binding compared to wild-type.
A53T variant exhibited increased membrane binding affinity.
E46K variant displayed disrupted membrane binding dynamics.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Buffer-only control used to establish baseline.

Validation controls P/LP.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Membrane binding affinity within physiological range

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Membrane binding affinity deviating by >20% from baseline

Approved assay.Description: The method is specific to studying alpha-synuclein interactions rather than a standard PD assay.

Readout description.Result Description: A30P variant showed decreased lipid interaction capacity.
A53T variant demonstrated increased lipid binding affinity.
E46K variant exhibited disrupted lipid interaction patterns.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type alpha-synuclein used as positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Buffer-only control used to establish baseline.

Validation controls P/LP.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Validation controls B/LB.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Statistical analysis method.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the text.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Lipid binding affinity within physiological range

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Lipid binding affinity deviating by >20% from baseline

Approved assay.Description: The method is specific to studying alpha-synuclein interactions rather than a standard PD assay.
